snippet: Israeli politics have been drifting rightward for years, and many see that trend sharpening and solidifying now.
abstract: Memo from Jerusalem; many liberal Israelis say that current conflict in Gaza has sharpened rightward turn in country's politics that has intensified in recent years; cite crackdown on open discourse and dissent, hostility towards those who empathize with Palestinian casualties and a disturbingly high level of support for war.
lead_paragraph: Israeli politics have been drifting rightward for years, and many see that trend sharpening and solidifying now.

headline.main: Some Israelis Count Open Discourse and Dissent Among Gaza War Casualties
headline.print_headline: Some Israelis Count Open Discourse and Dissent Among Gaza War Casualties
